message: Let's get this started! Take the smaller share and we can play again.
You started with a bold move, let's try something more balanced.
You're being too generous, Bob. I'm taking more this time.
Trying to balance the scales now. Your turn to make a counteroffer!
Time to take control, Bob. You can't outmaneuver me.
Taking a firmer stance now. You're getting closer to the edge!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take control now.
